definitions: the action or process of making something stronger or more solid
shortDefinitions: action or process of strengthening something

definitions: the action or process of combining a number of things into a single more effective or coherent whole

examples.text: a consolidation of data within an enterprise

shortDefinitions: action or process of combining combine several things into single more effective

definitions: the action or process of combining a number of financial accounts or funds into a single overall account or set of accounts

examples.text: a business selling debt consolidation services

shortDefinitions: action of combining several financial accounts into single account
